0.9.0.name: wordpress/powies-irc-chat
0.9.0.description:
This plugin includes a IRC chat system on a wordpress page or post. It makes usage of the coolsmile IRC applet. Just enter irc server, port and channels to join on the settings page. Include shortcode PIRC on a page and your chat is ready.

Including:

Coolsmile Chat Software

Support

Support Forum @ powie.de
